page.title: 14CAROLINE'S DAY--MONDAY
page.content: I get up at about seven o'clock in the morning,I have a bath and then get dressed , I have my breakfast at 8 o'clock, leave for school at 8.40 and walk about half a mile to school,arriving here at 8.50. First of all we read while the registers are done and then we have assembly.After assembly we do spellings and then we do mathematics for the rest of the morning with a stop for playtime at 10.30. At 11.45 the girls lay the tables for lunch in the Infants classroom.We finish lunch at 12.30,play until 1.15 and then we do project work for most of the afternoon.After a short playtime our teacher reads us a story until we put on our coats.We go home at 3.30.I get changed and then go out to play until tea time.
